name: Evil Robot of Doom Crushes Innocent Town due to Parliamentary Disagreement
name_original: Evil Robot of Doom Crushes Innocent Town due to Parliamentary Disagreement
description:
Control the robot of the mad local member of parliament hellbent on destroying his neighbouring town after they sent him an insulting letter regarding his parliamentary decisions.

Originally made for Ludum Dare 25.

Includes Game Jolt highscores.
